idea-plugin.name: CmdFloat
idea-plugin.description:
CmdFloat is a modern command-line overlay for IdeaVim users that makes `:`, `/`, and `?` feel quicker and easier to use.

Key Features

  • Intercepts :, /, and ? to display a command or search overlay near the caret instead of at the status bar.
  • Stores the most recent 20 commands or searches; use Up/Down to cycle through history and Esc to cancel.
  • CmdLine supports suggestion options
  • Search supports showing all current words
  • Search supports displaying the total number of matches and the current index
  • The suggestion box supports shortcut keys by default: up/down arrows, Tab/Shift+Tab, ctrl+n/ctrl+p
